description:
This your ultimate Couples Guide to discovering lasting Connection and Happiness within your relationship. During this course you will learn the tools to help you feel SEEN, HEARD, and LOVED within your relationship.

This course is for you if:

You want to improve the passion and connection in your relationship.

You want to learn what makes a healthy and happy relationship.

You want to be SEEN, HEARD and LOVED in your relationship.

You want to experience Happiness with your partner.

This course is best done as a weekly activity with your partner. Plan a time each week to listen to a lecture together and then practice the new tools during the week.

You will learn:

How to Become a Healthy and Happy couple

The Benefits of being a Healthy and Happy couple

The Art of Effective Communication

How to put Forgiveness in Action in your Relationship

How to create and encourage moments of Connection

Sustain Consistent Happiness in your Relationship

You will receive:

Tools to assess and understand your Language of Love

Tools to discover your Needs within a relationship

Activities and Exercises to strengthen your Communication

Activities and Exercises to discover lasting Connection and Happiness

I invite you to start the journey to each other today. Why wait? This journey can begin today, right now. What are you waiting for?
title: Couples Guide: Connect and Be Happy in Your Relationship!
